ðŸ“– Summary: GuardDog is a command-line interface tool designed to detect malicious packages across various ecosystems including PyPI, npm, Go, GitHub Actions, and VSCode extensions. It employs both source code analysis using Semgrep rules and package metadata heuristics to identify security threats.
